title: Carlsbad Caverns National Park: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Elevators Are Temporarily Out of Service  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Elevators Are Temporarily Out of Service  Elevators are temporarily out of service. Mechanics will travel in to diagnose and repair the issue. The park is open and visitors may hike in and out of the cavern.
